name: Ham Spam
description:
Ham Spam is a game in which you have to collect pork in order to make ham burgers to supply and for that you have to kill some pigs. You have to get as much pork as possible inside the time counter.

Use W and D keys to move left and right respectively.

It's a really stupid game but I thought why not give something stupid a try this time.

Credits:

I did everything except the music.

Music : www.freesound.org
